text: ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُواْ شُعَيۡبٗا كَأَن لَّمۡ يَغۡنَوۡاْ فِيهَاۚ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُواْ شُعَيۡبٗا كَانُواْ هُمُ ٱلۡخَٰسِرِينَ

translation.en: Those who denied Shu'ayb - it was as though they had never resided there. Those who denied Shu'ayb - it was they who were the losers
translation.id: Orang-orang yang mendustakan Syu'aib seakan-akan mereka belum pernah tinggal di (negeri) itu. Mereka yang mendustakan Syu'aib, itulah orang-orang yang rugi
